organization.description: Compassion in Action offers support groups and recovery programs for addictions (alcohol, drug, compulsive gambling) and for their family (co-dependents). As well as individual addiction counseling, family counseling, relapse prevention, 12-step program, life skill classes, referrals, and education on addiction. All services are provided in Spanish.\n\nPrograms offered include: Refugio de Amor (substance abuse program), Esperanza (gambling addiction program), M.A.S (reentry and recovery classes).
organization.name: COMPASSION IN ACTION MINISTRIES, INC.
